meanings: (무릎을) kneel (down), fall[drop, sink] to one's knees, (기도하기 위해) (formal) genuflect

meanings.meaning: let this come to a boil

vlive.korean: 무릎 꿇고! On his knees! 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#378. 열려라 에이티즈 (스페셜 DJ AOA 지민&찬미 with 에이티즈)
애들한테 사과하면 돼? 무릎이라도 꿇을까? Do you want me to apologize to them? Kneel down? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 변태 선생 경찰차에 태우는 법_EP22_[라이크LIKE]
vlive.english: Do you want me to apologize to them? Kneel down?

vlive.korean: 거의 무릎을 꿇었어요 - 로빈아, 협박당한 거 아니지? almost. - ROBIN, you weren't threatened, were you? 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : 🌏 보고싶어서 왔클! 4인실 + 2인실 🌏
vlive.english: almost. - ROBIN, you weren't threatened, were you?

vlive.korean: [하... 트러플 오일도 무릎 꿇었다는 단 하나뿐인 기름 정윤호 온리유...] [Whew... Even truffle oil doesn't stand a chance against Yoon Ho...] View video V PICK! : [ATEEZ] 울 요정들 입 벌려!! 사랑 들어간다🧡＼(´∇｀)ノ (Yunho&WooYoung eating tteokguk&ice cream)

examples.korean: Time can bend your knees. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 세월은 당신을 무릎 꿇게 만들 수 있어요. Neungyule
examples.english: Time can bend your knees. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Do not let fear bring you to your knees. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 두려움이 당신의 무릎을 꿇게 하지 말아라. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Do not let fear bring you to your knees. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: But it definitely deserves a round of applause for making a soup out of King Leonidas' battle epic. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 하지만 닌자거북이는 레오니다스 왕의 전쟁 서사시를 무릎 꿇게 한 것에 대해 박수갈채를 받을만하다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: But it definitely deserves a round of applause for making a soup out of King Leonidas' battle epic. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: On the women’s side, the KT&G Kites pushed defending champion, the Heungkuk Life Pink Spiders, to their knees. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 여성의 경우, 안양 KT&G 카이트가 방어 챔피언인 흥국생명 핑크 스파이더를 무릎 꿇게 했습니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: On the women’s side, the KT&G Kites pushed defending champion, the Heungkuk Life Pink Spiders, to their knees. Add to Wordbook
